channel.title: Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings

item.title: OpenAI acquires Software Applications Incorporated, maker of Sky
item.description: OpenAI has acquired Software Applications Incorporated, maker of Sky—a natural language interface for Mac that brings AI directly into your desktop experience. Together, we’re integrating Sky’s deep macOS capabilities into ChatGPT to make AI more intuitive, contextual, and action-oriented. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/openai-acquires-software-applications-incorporated

item.title: Consensus accelerates research with GPT-5 and Responses API
item.description: Consensus uses GPT-5 and OpenAI’s Responses API to power a multi-agent research assistant that reads, analyzes, and synthesizes evidence in minutes—helping over 8 million researchers accelerate scientific discovery. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/consensus

item.title: AI in South Korea—OpenAI’s Economic Blueprint
item.description: OpenAI's Korea Economic Blueprint outlines how South Korea can scale trusted AI through sovereign capabilities and strategic partnerships to drive growth. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/south-korea-economic-blueprint

item.title: Work smarter with your company knowledge in ChatGPT
item.description: Company knowledge brings context from your apps into ChatGPT for answers specific to your business, with clear citations, security, privacy, and admin controls. Available now for Business, Enterprise, and Edu users. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/introducing-company-knowledge

item.title: The next chapter for UK sovereign AI
item.description: OpenAI expands its UK partnership with a new Ministry of Justice agreement, bringing ChatGPT to civil servants. It also introduces UK data residency for ChatGPT Enterprise, ChatGPT Edu, and the API Platform to support trusted and secure AI adoption. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/the-next-chapter-for-uk-sovereign-ai

item.title: AI in Japan—OpenAI’s Japan Economic Blueprint
item.description: OpenAI’s Japan Economic Blueprint outlines how Japan can harness AI to boost innovation, strengthen competitiveness, and enable sustainable, inclusive growth. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/japan-economic-blueprint

item.title: Introducing ChatGPT Atlas, the browser with ChatGPT built in
item.description: ChatGPT Atlas, the browser with ChatGPT built it. Get instant answers, summaries, and smart web help—right from any page. With privacy settings you can control. Available now for MacOS. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/introducing-chatgpt-atlas
